titles.title: DRIVERS Act
Developing Robust Investments in Vehicle Education for Roadway Safety Act
DRIVERS Act
To amend title 23, United States Code, to encourage affordable and accessible classroom-based driving instruction and behind-the-wheel training in highway safety programs, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

bill.summary:
Developing Robust Investments in Vehicle Education for Roadway Safety Act or the DRIVERS Act
This bill addresses statewide efforts to improve traffic safety for teen drivers.
Specifically, the bill authorizes states to use highway safety program funding for affordable and accessible classroom-based driving instruction to prepare teens for state graduated driving license requirements.
